version_description:
[FIXED]
Tracks could not be loaded in some cases right after installing WeDJ.

[NEW]
・Pitch bend
[IMPROVED]
・Improved stability and fixed other minor issues.

[FIXED]
・ Crashed when loading tracks to iPhone with the versions before iOS9.3.
・ Sometimes crashed during track analysis.

[FIXED]
We’ve added a satisfaction survey so we can make continual improvements.

-Compatible DJ controller 'DDJ-200'
-Compatible music streaming services 'Beatport LINK' and 'SoundCloud Go+'
-Added new functions (Tutorial, Pop-Hint, TRANSITION FX, PHRASE SYNC, Track Suggestion, etc.)
-Improved stability and fixed other minor
